sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"建设，建立，建造"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: build, construct, found, erect, establish, set up
means: build ： 普通用词，含义广泛，可指一切具体或抽象的建造或建立。
construct ： 较正式用词，强调根据一定计划进行的规模较大，结构较复杂，要求较高技术的建造。
found ： 侧重打下基础或创办，具体或抽象事物均可用。
erect ： 侧重指对高而垂直物的建造。使用不如build广泛。
establish ： 着重稳固地建成，可具体指国家、政府、学校或商店等的建立，也可指信仰、信用、名誉、法律、制度、规则等的建立。
set up ： 作"建立"用时，侧重于"开始"。可指具体或抽象的建立。

sentence.Network_en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentence.Network_en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentence.Network_cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentence.Network_en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

jx.jx_en_mean: To construct or include as an integral part of
jx.jx_cn_mean: 建造，建立：作为一个整体来建设或包括在内

lj.lj_ly: a wall with shelving that was built in; build stability into the economy.
lj.lj_ls: 建造有架子的墙；建立经济的稳定性

jx.jx_en_mean: To use as a basis or foundation

lj.lj_ly: We must build on our recent success.
lj.lj_ls: 我们必须依靠现有的成功

jx.jx_en_mean: To develop or increase in stages or by degrees
jx.jx_cn_mean: 扩大，集结，支持：逐步或分阶段的发展或增加

lj.lj_ly: built up the business; building up my endurance for the marathon.
lj.lj_ls: 扩大企业；为跑马拉松而增强我的耐力

lj.lj_ly: sediment building up on the ocean floor.
build up the product with a massive ad campaign; built up my hopes after the interview.
lj.lj_ls: 通过大量的广告活动来树立这种产品；在面试后增加我的希望

jx.jx_en_mean: To fill up (an area) with buildings.
become ever more hopeful or optimistic about something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对…抱有更大希望（变得更加乐观）

jx.jx_en_mean: (figurative)without reliable foundations or any real substance

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  byldan, from bold, botl 'dwelling', of Germanic origin; related to bower

encyclopedia.content: Build版在软件发布上主要用于区分不同时期的版本，它是编译时的版本标记，一般序号都是递增的。可用于辨别软件的版本。 版本号里面的Build说明这个版本是第几次编译的结果，它后面一般跟数字或日期。关于软件版本号，请参考下面介绍：

entry.def: If you build something, you make it by joining things together.

example.ex: Developers are now proposing to build a hotel on the site...
example.tran: 开发商现在建议在这个地方盖一座宾馆。

example.ex: The house was built in the early 19th century...
example.tran: 这所房子建于19世纪初期。

entry.def: If you build something into a wall or object, you make it in such a way that it is in the wall or object, or is part of it.

example.ex: If the TV was built into the ceiling, you could lie there while watching your favourite programme.
example.tran: 如果把电视嵌入天花板，你就可以躺在那里欣赏你最喜欢的节目了。

entry.def: If people build an organization, a society, or a relationship, they gradually form it.

example.ex: He and a partner set up on their own and built a successful fashion company...
example.tran: 他和同伴自己创业，创办了一家成功的时装公司。

example.ex: Their purpose is to build a fair society and a strong economy...
example.tran: 他们的目的是要建立一个公平的社会和一个强大的经济体。

entry.tran: 把（组织、系统或产品）建立于
entry.def: If you build an organization, system, or product on something, you base it on it.

example.ex: We will then have a firmer foundation of fact on which to build theories...
example.tran: 那样我们将会获得一个建立理论所需的更为牢固的事实基础。

example.ex: The town's  nineteenth-century prosperity was built on steel.
example.tran: 这个城市19世纪的繁荣是建立在钢铁工业基础上的。

entry.tran: 使成为（政策、系统或产品的）组成部分
entry.def: If you build something into a policy, system, or product, you make it part of it.

example.ex: We have to build computers into the school curriculum...
example.tran: 我们必须把计算机纳入到学校的课程中。

example.ex: How much delay should we build into the plan?
example.tran: 我们应该为这个计划预留多少富余的时间？

entry.def: To build someone's confidence or trust means to increase it gradually. If someone's  confidence or trust builds, it increases gradually.

example.ex: The encouragement that young boys receive builds a greater self-confidence...
example.tran: 小男孩受到的鼓励会增强他们的自信心。

example.ex: Diplomats hope the meetings will build mutual trust...
example.tran: 外交官们希望会议能增进彼此的信任。

entry.def: If you build on the success of something, you take advantage of this success in order to make further progress.

example.ex: Build on the qualities you are satisfied with and work to change those you are unhappy with...
example.tran: 以自己满意的优点为发展基础，努力改变自己不满意的地方。

example.ex: The new regime has no successful economic reforms on which to build.
example.tran: 新政权没有成功实施可赖以为继的经济改革。

entry.tran: （压力、速度、声音或激情）逐渐变大，逐渐增强
entry.def: If pressure, speed, sound, or excitement builds, it gradually becomes greater.

example.ex: Pressure built yesterday for postponement of the ceremony...
example.tran: 要求推迟仪式的压力昨天进一步增大。

example.ex: The last chords of the suite build to a crescendo.
example.tran: 组曲的最后和音部分渐入高潮。

entry.def: Someone's build is the shape that their bones and muscles give to their body.

example.ex: He's described as around thirty years old, six feet tall and of medium build...
example.tran: 他被描述成一个30岁左右、6英尺高、中等身材的人。

example.ex: The authority of his voice is undermined by the smallness of his build.
example.tran: 瘦小的身形削弱了他声音中的权威感。

means.word_mean: 2. alternative names for the body of a human being;

sentences.sentence: "the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak"

means.word_mean: 1. make by combining materials and parts;

sentences.sentence: "this little pig made his house out of straw"
"Some eccentric constructed an electric brassiere warmer"
"Resistance to the manager's plan built up quickly"
"Pressure is building up at the Indian-Pakistani border"

means.word_mean: 5. order, supervise, or finance the construction of;

sentences.sentence: "The government is building new schools in this state"

means.word_mean: 6. give form to, according to a plan;

sentences.sentence: "These architects build in interesting and new styles"
"build a defense on nothing but the accused person's reputation"
"Suspense was building right from the beginning of the opera"

auth_sentence.content: The company already has permission for a smaller build.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company already has permission for a smaller build.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company already has permission for a smaller build.

auth_sentence.content: We couldn't build a digital text service blind.
auth_sentence.res_content: We couldn't build a digital text service blind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We couldn't build a digital text service blind.

auth_sentence.content: I'd rather we build more power plants instead.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd rather we build more power plants instead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd rather we build more power plants instead.

sentences.en: You can trust his word, he's been building for more than 20 years.
sentences.cn: 你可以相信他的话, 20多年来他一直在从事建筑。

sentences.en: They have built another space station.
sentences.cn: 他们又建了一个太空站。

sentences.en: They will build us a new school.
sentences.cn: 他们将给我们建造一所新学校。

sentences.en: Our neighbours built their walls high.
sentences.cn: 我们的邻居把墙砌得很高。

sentences.en: He built a school for the blind.
sentences.cn: 他创办了一所盲人学校。

sentences.en: He is a man of large build.
These tall buildings are in the same build.
sentences.cn: 这些高层建筑物结构相同。

jushi.english: As the crisis built, a political aide acknowledged that Carter's image was suffering.
jushi.chinese: 随着危机的逐步加深,一位总统的助手承认,卡特的形象正在受到损害。

jushi.english: The wind began to build and the sleet to blow about.
jushi.chinese: 风开始大起来了,雨雪四处飞扬。
